name: REPEATER (AntOnion Games)
description:
Complete levels controlling two characters and solving spatial puzzles

Prototype #6 / 11

This game is one of the prototypes made in a week as part of the "souls-like prototyping" challenge.

And one more challenge: to make a game-prototype without coding and scripting using only ready-made assets.

  • Genre: Puzzle, Platformer
  • Unusual game mechanics: control two characters at the same time

Controls:

  • W, A, S, D - Movement
  • SPACE - Jump
